Author: princessvana
Text: Relatable! I’m 5’7” and when my ED first flared up, I was down to 128 lbs. Then I recovered my way up to 155 lbs 😭 Back down to 139... recovered up to 148 and I’m now back down to 143. I get so mad at myself, like if I’d just stuck with it I’d have been down to goal weight ages ago. But I’ll just keep on keeping on I guess...

Author: Rickticia
Text: I 100% relate. I let myself eat without abandoned for two months and I am back to being overweight at 151 pounds, and I’m struggling to control my eating. I know how frustrating it can be to have to work back down, but I know we got this.
